sentences.en: Airlines would prefer to update rather than retrain crews.
sentences.cn: 航空公司宁愿增添新机组人员而不愿对老的机组人员进行再培训。

sentences.en: Retrain team members on process before deploying new tools.
sentences.cn: 在部署新工具前对团队成员进行再培训。

sentences.en: We will educate our young well, and retrain our older workers effectively.
sentences.cn: 我们要好好地培养下一代，并且为年长员工提供有效的培训。
